summary: Adds toggleable invisibility, stop time, night eye, detect life.
descriptionHtml:
Adds 4 spells to your character:
Toggleable invisibility
Toggleable stop time
Toggleable night eye
Detect life for 5 seconds

Highly recommend to use with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36328/?]Grimy Utilities[/url] so you can assign hot keys to these abilities without having to change spells or cast manually.

Few notes about spells:

Invisibility spell must be toggled on / off by casting the spell again. If you somehow lose the invisibility effect it will automatically recast so you can steal, hit, kill and do what you want without having to worry about losing invisibility. There is a small delay about 0.25 second when you lose the effect until it is reapplied but enemies shouldn't be able to detect you in that time.

Stop time effect must be toggled on / off by casting spell again as well. It isn't complete stop time but it slows time to 1% of what it normally is so you can easily outrun arrows or spells.

Night eye effect must be toggled as well. I use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8090/?]this mod[/url] to get rid of the blur effect on night vision as I don't like it.

Detect life isn't toggled, it just casts detect life for 5 seconds. I didn't like to have it on all the time because I found it annoying. Vanilla detect life doesn't show undead, daedra or dwemer machines but this version shows all.

The spells are added to your character automatically. That's all, if you would like some more cool spells post your idea and I might make it if I have time. :)

Update 1.1:
Fixed invisibility not reapplying sometimes.
Also changed how stop time looks.
author: meh321
